channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sinkhole Granville Street, 11th June
item.description:
Outside 15 Granville Street, small hole has already formed but alot of the ground around it looks like it will fall in anytime now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight acrosss the road from 38 kingmead avenue cheltenham, 11th June
item.description:
Street light not working for over a year
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Kingsmead Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Fly Tipped Rubbish at Location, 11th June
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry on Cleeve Common Road. Rubbish has been left at the location. Please can it be cleared up before it is spread by the wind
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Treee needs cutting overgrown council tree hanging into my garden, 11th June
item.description:
Contacted the council via email, tree cutters came to kingmead avenue and trimmed council trees in March said they would return to cut the tree in dormer road but have not done
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Dormer Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken drain cover in middle of pavement with a 2 inch trip hazard please take a look at it on Shakespeare Road, 10th June
item.description:
Sunken drain cover in middle of pavement with a 2 inch trip hazard please take a look at it on Shakespeare Road

item.title: Collapsed drain cover, 9th June
item.description:
A square drain cover on the westbound carriageway appears to be freshly collapsing. Across the road from : 127 Arle Road CHELTENHAM GL51 8LJ
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 131 Arle Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown hedge blocking pavement, 9th June
item.description:
The pavement can not be accessed now due to the encroaching hedge. It nearly reaches the road, and needs to be cut right back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Pumphreys Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous drain cover keeps lifting, 8th June
item.description:
We have a lot of elderly people in the road and we’ve just seen a little girl come off her scooter because this drain cover won’t stay down

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Bushcombe Close, Woodmancote

Path overgrown

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Rochester Close, Cheltenham

item.title: Over grown hedgerow, 8th June
item.description:
Very difficult to walk along the footpath with children/ pushchairs due to stinging nettles and brambles over growing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hillview Battledown Approach, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Purple graffiti on footpath outside residence, 8th June
item.description:
On the 7th of June 2022, some graffiti appeared on the footpath directly outside No 2. Prince Regent Avenue, Cheltenham. There are further examples along the path. It looks like purple spray paint used directly on the path itself. This is part of the Honeybourne line.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Prince Regent Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle Track route 41 from Gloucesterhire Airport through to Churchdown park is getting very overgrown and causing issues for cyclists and walkers to pass., 8th June
item.description:
This occurs every year esspecially after rain when the grasses and hesdges grow very quickly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous parking, 7th June
item.description:
Parking on the corner of Castle Hill Drive the parent was trying to cross the road into oncoming traffic with three children towards the school. The parent had completely obscured hers and others view in order to drive or cross the road safely. There are zig zags opposite this section of road. Is there a possibility to put zig zags along Abbotswood Road turning into Castle Hill Drive to prevent this? Please see image for location. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Castle Hill Drive, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 7th June
item.description:
There is quite a lot of dog mess on Pilley Lane on both sides, predominately near the nursing home and also opposite. We would be grateful if you could please clean this. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Pilley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Dangerous pavement, 6th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Coberley Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Broken slats in bridge, 5th June
item.description:
There is a pedestrian path leading from Appleton Way to Carisbrooke Road, with a wooden footbridge. The footbridge has wooden slats of which some are broken and could cause a fall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Carisbrooke Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet
